languages.text: "Передать по вокс-связи: именем инквизитора Ютана Холла всему экипажу предписывается вооружиться и начать общую зачистку трюмов".

traits.locale_text: "Передать по вокс-связи: говорит капитан корабля, инквизитор Ютан Холл. Всему экипажу, вооружиться и начать общую зачистку пассажирских трюмов".

languages.text: "Broadcast this over all vox-channels: in the name of Inquisitor Yutan Holl, all crew members are hereby ordered to take up arms and begin a total purge of the holds."
languages.original_text: "Передать по вокс-связи: именем инквизитора Ютана Холла всему экипажу предписывается вооружиться и начать общую зачистку трюмов".

traits.locale_text: "Broadcast this over all vox-channels: This is the ship's captain speaking, Inquisitor Yutan Hall. All crewmembers are hereby ordered to take up arms and begin a total purge of the passenger holds."
"Broadcast this over all vox-channels: in the name of Inquisitor Yutan Hall, all crew members are hereby ordered to take up arms and begin a total purge of the holds."
"Broadcast this over all vox-channels: This is the ship's captain speaking, Inquisitor Yutan Hall. All crewmembers are hereby ordered to take up arms and begin a total purge of the passenger holds."
"Broadcast this over all vox-channels: in the name of Inquisitor Yutan Hall, all crew members are hereby ordered to take up arms and begin a total purge of the holds."
"Broadcast this over all vox-channels: this is Inquisitor Yutan Hall speaking. All crew members are hereby ordered to take up arms and begin a total purge of the holds."
"Broadcast this over all vox-channels: in the name of Inquisitor Yutan Hall, all crew members are hereby ordered to take up arms and begin a total purge of the holds."

languages.text: “在所有音阵频道上广播这条信息。我是审判官尤坦·霍尔，我在此命令，所有船员拿起武器，开始对整艘船进行全面净化。”
languages.original_text: "Broadcast this over all vox-channels: in the name of Inquisitor Yutan Holl, all crew members are hereby ordered to take up arms and begin a total purge of the holds."

traits.locale_text: “在所有音阵频道上广播这条信息。我是舰长，审判官尤坦·霍尔。我在此命令，所有船员拿起武器，开始对客舱进行全面净化。”

languages.text: «Transmita esto por todos los canales de voco. En nombre del inquisidor Yutan Holl, ordeno a todos los tripulantes que empuñen sus armas e inicien una purga total de las bodegas».
languages.original_text: "Broadcast this over all vox-channels: in the name of Inquisitor Yutan Holl, all crew members are hereby ordered to take up arms and begin a total purge of the holds."

traits.locale_text: «Transmita esto por todos los canales de voco. En nombre del inquisidor Yutan Holl, ordeno a todos los tripulantes que empuñen sus armas e inicien una purga total de las bodegas».

languages.text: 「すべてのヴォクス通信に向けて放送せよ。ユータン・ホール異端審問官の名において、全クルーに武装を命じる。直ちに完全粛清を開始せよ」
languages.original_text: "Broadcast this over all vox-channels: in the name of Inquisitor Yutan Holl, all crew members are hereby ordered to take up arms and begin a total purge of the holds."

traits.locale_text: 「すべての音声チャンネルに向けて放送せよ。こちらは本船の船長、ユータン・ホール異端審問官だ。全クルーに武装を命じる。直ちに客室の完全粛清を開始せよ」

languages.text: "Sendet folgende Nachricht über alle Vox-Kanäle: Im Namen von Inquisitor Yutan Holl ergeht hiermit an alle Crewmitglieder der Befehl, zu den Waffen zu greifen und eine vollständige Säuberung der Frachträume durchzuführen."
languages.original_text: "Broadcast this over all vox-channels: in the name of Inquisitor Yutan Holl, all crew members are hereby ordered to take up arms and begin a total purge of the holds."

traits.locale_text: "Sendet folgende Nachricht über alle Vox-Kanäle: Hier spricht der Kapitän des Schiffs, Inquisitor Yutan Hall. An alle Crewmitglieder ergeht hiermit der Befehl, zu den Waffen zu greifen und eine vollständige Säuberung der Passagierräume durchzuführen."

languages.text: « Diffusez ceci sur tous les canaux-vox : au nom de l'inquisiteur Yutan Holl, tous les membres d'équipage ont ordre de prendre les armes et de purger les soutes jusque dans leurs moindres recoins. »
languages.original_text: "Broadcast this over all vox-channels: in the name of Inquisitor Yutan Holl, all crew members are hereby ordered to take up arms and begin a total purge of the holds."

traits.locale_text: « Diffusez ceci sur tous les canaux-vox : au nom de l'inquisiteur Yutan Holl, tous les membres d'équipage ont ordre de prendre les armes et de purger les soutes jusque dans leurs moindres recoins. »

languages.text: "Tüm voks kanallarından yayınlansın: Engizisyoncu Yutan Holl adına, tüm mürettebata silahlanmaları ve ambar bölmelerini tamamen arındırmaları emredilmektedir."
languages.original_text: "Broadcast this over all vox-channels: in the name of Inquisitor Yutan Holl, all crew members are hereby ordered to take up arms and begin a total purge of the holds."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm voks kanallarından yayınlansın: Engizisyoncu Yutan Holl adına, tüm mürettebata silahlanmaları ve ambar bölmelerini tamamen arındırmaları emredilmektedir."
